item.description:
The beauty of Sunday is you can actually find a seat and talk to people cause it's not too loud.

Lots of very interesting people. Mostly rock n roll, motown, soul, & some blues. Very upbeat. But, if anyone gets tired here, four blocks down there is the Middle East practically next door which has no cover either. Belly dancing music w/ extremely well rehearsed live dancers. Starting at ten PM ending around 11PM.
item.why: NO COVER! Officially Cantab Sun's is an open mike but as it turns out there is a house band competition, & that is good; the MC keeps the musicians hot on their toes vying for time. It begins early for a Sunday, 9PM. Then people start dancing.
item.name: The Cantab Lounge free dancing and LIVE music.
